trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> elements within a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Vengono fornite informazioni sul <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> elementi all'interno di un <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: PageContent elements are the only allowable child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Elementi PageContent sono gli elementi figlio consentito solo un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: The order of the PageContent elements within the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> defines the page order.
trans-unit.target: L'ordine degli elementi PageContent all'interno di <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>definisce l'ordine delle pagine.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: PageContent provides information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> elements within a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> without the requiring the application to load individual pages.
trans-unit.target: PageContent vengono fornite informazioni sul <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>elementi all'interno di un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>senza richiedere che l'applicazione per caricare pagine singole.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> dependency property specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>specifica proprietà di dipendenza di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] corrispondente <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the PageContent element, see Chapter 3 of the XPS *Open XML Paper Specification* available for download at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'elemento PageContent, vedere il capitolo 3 di XPS *Open XML Paper Specification* disponibile per il download all'indirizzo [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> associato a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Child property returns a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> when: 1.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà restituisce figlio un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>quando: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> has an immediate <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> child defined in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>è un immediato <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>figlio definito in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] markup.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage></xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.System%23Windows%23Markup%23IAddChild%23AddChild%2A> has been called to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> as the child of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.System%23Windows%23Markup%23IAddChild%23AddChild%2A>È stato chiamato per impostare <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>come elemento figlio dell'elemento <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.System%23Windows%23Markup%23IAddChild%23AddChild%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Child property returns **null** when: 1.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà restituisce figlio **null** quando: 1.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> is set by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> property (when specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> is not cached).
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>è l'impostazione di <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>proprietà (quando è specificato dal <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>proprietà, il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>non memorizzato nella cache).</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> to return the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> when set by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>per restituire il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>quando l'impostazione di <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> element, see Chapter 3 of the XPS *XML Paper Specification* available for download at [http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>elemento, vedere il capitolo 3 di XPS *XML Paper Specification* disponibile per il download all'indirizzo [http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx).</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage You cannot use this property in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML testo utilizzo è possibile utilizzare questa proprietà in XAML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref>, or **null** when the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> is set by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source*> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> associato a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"> </xref>, o **null** quando il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> è l'impostazione di <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source*>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source*>

trans-unit.source: Loads and returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> content element.
trans-unit.target: Carica e restituisce il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> elemento di contenuto.

trans-unit.source: GetPageRoot performs synchronous loading and parsing of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: GetPageRoot esegue il caricamento e l'analisi di <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> sincrona

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>instead of GetPageRoot to avoid thread blocking while the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> loads.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>anziché GetPageRoot per evitare di thread che causano il blocco mentre il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>Carica.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to always reload the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> even if it has been previously loaded and cached; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to load the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> only if there is no cached version.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per ricaricare sempre il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> anche se è stato precedentemente caricato e memorizzato nella cache; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per caricare il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> solo se non è disponibile alcuna versione memorizzata nella cache.

trans-unit.source: The root element of the visual tree for this page.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento radice dell'albero visuale per questa pagina.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously loads and returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> content element.
trans-unit.target: Carica in modo asincrono e restituisce il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> elemento di contenuto.

trans-unit.source: GetPageRootAsync asynchronously loads and parses the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> data stream associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.
trans-unit.target: GetPageRootAsync in modo asincrono carica e analizza il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>flusso di dati associata a questo <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: Other threads will continue to run while GetPageRootAsync completes.
trans-unit.target: Altri thread continuerà a eseguire al completamento di GetPageRootAsync.

trans-unit.source: The following steps illustrate how to load the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> content asynchronously: 1.
trans-unit.target: La procedura seguente viene illustrato come caricare il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>contenuto in modo asincrono: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler> delegate and add it to be notified of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> events.
trans-unit.target: Creare un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler>delegato e aggiungerlo a una notifica di <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted>eventi.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Call GetPageRootAsync.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare GetPageRootAsync.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> event occurs and the delegate is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> content has completed loading.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted>si verifica l'evento e il delegato viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>contenuto ha terminato il caricamento.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The loaded <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> element is returned through the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il caricamento <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>elemento viene restituito tramite la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `<PageContent>` element, see chapter 3 of the XPS specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul `<PageContent>` elemento, vedere il capitolo 3 della specifica XPS è possibile ottenere in [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to always reload the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> even if it has been previously loaded and cached; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to load the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> only if there is no cached version.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per ricaricare sempre il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> anche se è stato precedentemente caricato e memorizzato nella cache; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per caricare il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> solo se non è disponibile alcuna versione memorizzata nella cache.

trans-unit.source: Cancels any current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*> operation in progress.
trans-unit.target: Annulla tutte le <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*>operazione in corso.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*>

trans-unit.source: GetPageRootAsyncCancel cancels any <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> operation that has not already finished with a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: GetPageRootAsyncCancel Annulla le <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>operazione che non ha già terminato con un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*> has completed.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*>è stata completata.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*>

trans-unit.source: The GetPageRootCompleted event is handled by methods based on the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: L'evento GetPageRootCompleted è gestito da metodi basati sul <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler>delegare.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget"></xref> elements that identify the hyperlink-addressable locations on the page.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget"> </xref> elementi che identificano i percorsi indirizzabili con collegamento ipertestuale nella pagina.

trans-unit.source: LinkTargets will never return `null`, but the collection may contain zero elements.
trans-unit.target: Non restituisce mai LinkTargets `null`, ma la raccolta può contenere zero elementi.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `<PageContent>` element, see chapter 3 of the XPS specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Il provider di servizi di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: if manager is not and it does not have an XmlWriter; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se manager non e non dispone di un oggetto XmlWriter; in caso contrario, .

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] to the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> content data stream.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] per il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> flusso di dati di contenuto.
